meanings.sent1: I love grilling franks on the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: The hot dog stand sells delicious franks.
meanings.sent3: At the picnic, the franks were the first to disappear.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling franks filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The juicy franks were a hit at the party.

meanings.sent1: I forgot to frank the letter before mailing it.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to frank the package before sending it out.
meanings.sent3: He decided to frank the postcard as a joke.
meanings.sent4: She quickly franked the envelope and dropped it in the mailbox.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to frank the letter to avoid delays.

meanings.definition: To mark with a frank or signature
meanings.sent1: The author will frank each book before signing it.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to frank the document before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: He likes to frank his artwork with a unique symbol.
meanings.sent4: The CEO will frank the official letter with his seal.
meanings.sent5: She carefully franked the contract with her signature.
